import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({selector:'app-about',templateUrl:'./about.component.html',styleUrls:['./about.component.css']}) export class AboutComponent {}

About Me

I'm Bazmi Uddin, a Full Stack Developer from Gwalior with over 3 years of hands-on experience in building and optimizing scalable web applications using Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter & AdonisJS), and MySQL.

Currently, I’m working at Ubitech Solutions Pvt. Ltd., where I lead a team of developers to design and implement HRMS and CRM platforms. My work focuses on automating attendance systems, dynamic leave policy management, and real-time employee engagement tools — improving system efficiency and overall user experience.

I’m deeply passionate about building user-centric, high-performance applications that balance strong technical architecture with clean, modern UI design. I take pride in writing clean, reusable code and constantly challenge myself to learn and implement new technologies.

My journey in software development began during my B.Tech in Computer Science at IPS College of Management & Technology, where I discovered my love for solving logical problems through code. Since then, I’ve dedicated myself to building meaningful digital solutions that create real impact.

Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new frameworks, experimenting with UI trends, and mentoring junior developers to help them grow into confident engineers.

💡 Full Stack Web Development
⚙️ HRMS & Workflow Automation
🚀 Clean Architecture & Scalable Design
🎯 Team Leadership & Mentoring

🎓 Education

Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) – Computer Science

IPS College of Management & Technology, Gwalior

Graduated: 2021
  • Angular
  • TypeScript

  • PHP (CodeIgniter / AdonisJS)
